https://tmrev.io/movie/42124-Burden of Dreams 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qJuD9yZ7Mn9QCVqKO9WarNNYo4R.jpg The Amazon rain forest, 1979. The crew of Fitzcarraldo (1982), a film directed by German director Werner Herzog, soon finds itself with problems related to casting, tribal struggles and accidents, among many other setbacks; but nothing compared to dragging a huge steamboat up a mountain, while Herzog embraces the path of a certain madness to make his vision come true. Burden of Dreams
